oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Steve Seskin - 2018-05-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Steve Seskin from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 5, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Steven Seskin;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Songwriter introduction begins in progress / (00:11) Opening comments from Steve / (00:25) Introduction of first song / (01:17) Performs This Is My Day / (04:30) Talks about opening shows for Crystal Gayle and coming to Nashville / (05:48) Introduces the next song / (06:06) Performs Grown Men Down Cry / (10:00) Talks about the previous song / (12:10) Talks about the next song / (13:39) Performs Wrong / (16:20) Introduces the next song / (17:33) Performs Life's A Dance / (20:10) Tells story about an artist refusing to record the song All I Need To Know because of one line in the song as an introduction to the next song / (23:27) Performs All I Need To Know / (26:46) Answers question about country music's popularity in San Francisco, California / (28:20) Answers question about who he co-writes songs with / (30:29) Talks about how he became interested in music, songwriting and the type of music he likes to hear / (36:05) Introduces the next song / (37:25) Performs Don't Laugh At Me / (40:42) Final comments / (41:04) Walk-out music / (50:41) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:format: original source recorded as an mp3 file at 44.1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Seskin, Steve; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
